page.title: 06 - RECREATION
page.content:
The main place for organised sport in the area is Duncton Recreation Ground. Here stoolball, cricket and football are played, and a new pavilion has just been built.Badminton is played in Duncton Village Hall.
Clay pigeon shooting is a more recent innovation and pheasant shooting takes place during the appropriate season.
There is fishing on the south bank of the river Rother and also at Burton pond, where pike, tench, and eels are caught.
There are occasional meetings at Bigenor Farm near Shopham bridge where Motorcycle cross events take place.
(see CLUBS, ARTS & CRAFTS)
